Title: Evidence List: Effect estimates for meta-analysis (Biegel 2020, Wang 2020, SOLIDARITY)

Status: current

Mode: working

Subject: Efficacy of Corticosteroids in COVID-19 Patients: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis (112)

Author/Creator: Brian S. Alper

FlagDateItem
Biegel 2020 data 35/541 vs. 61/521
Wang 2020 data 15/153 vs. 7/78
